document.docAuthor: Kovařík, František, Lowe, Graeme, Stockmann, Mark & Šťáhlavský, František
document.masterDocTitle: Revision of genus-group taxa in the family Scorpiopidae Kraepelin, 1905, with description of 15 new species (Arachnida Scorpiones)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of genus-group taxa in the family Scorpiopidae Kraepelin, 1905, with description of 15 new species (Arachnida Scorpiones)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
=
Dasyscorpiops Vachon, 1974: 952–953
, figs. 142, 147, 160– 162 ( type species
Dasyscorpiops grandjeani Vachon,

=
Scorpiops ( Neoscorpiops ) Vachon, 1980: 150
, 151, figs. 10– 16 ( type species
Scorpiops montanus satarensis Pocock, 1900
); Tikader & Bastawade, 1983: 382–483, figs. 1060– 1128;
Francke, 1985: 13
. Syn . n .

=
Scorpiops ( Alloscorpiops ) Vachon, 1980: 151
, figs. 18–25 ( type species
Scorpiops anthracinus Simon, 1887
);
Francke, 1985: 13
. Syn . n .

=
Scorpiops ( Euscorpiops ) Vachon, 1980: 155
, figs. 26–32 ( type species
Scorpiops asthenurus Pocock, 1900
); Tikader & Bastawade, 1983: 452–476, figs. 1247–1305;
Francke, 1985: 13
(syn. by
Kovařík, 2000: 164
, restored to generic status by Soleglad & Sissom, 2001: 93, and synonymized here again).

=
Alloscorpiops ( Laoscorpiops ) Lourenço, 2013a: 52–55
, figs. 2–3 ( type species
Alloscorpiops ( Laoscorpiops ) calmonti Lourenço, 2013
);
Francke, 2019: 3
(syn. by Kovařík et al., 2013: 1).
